Notifications.registrationError: EasyMovement | Error: Failed to modify token drag behavior. The module may not function as expected. Please check the console (F12) for more details.

modifyDragBehavior.Name: Enable Right-Click Waypoints
modifyDragBehavior.Hint: Enables modified right-click behavior during token dragging. Right-click will add a waypoint, CTRL/CMD + Right-click will remove the last waypoint. Requires a reload if changed.

hints.1: Select a movement type to quickly activate by pressing the assigned hotkey. Leave blank to disable.
